DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the effects of 12 weeks' increased daily physical activity versus diet restriction on regional fat distribution, insulin sensitivity and adipokines including retinol binding protein-4 (RBP-4), leptin, adiponectin, and a new marker, adiponectin to leptin ratio (AL ratio), in type 2 diabetic women.
DOC.brief_title: Exercise and Diet in Type 2 Diabetic Women
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic patient BMI>23kg/m2 Female The patients with comorbidity such as heart failure, chronic kidney disease or liver cirrhosis
